info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:09AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Ogle and northern Lee Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 609 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Polo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Rochelle, Oregon, Mount Morris, Polo, Hillcrest, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Lost Nation, Creston, Grand Detour, Steward, Woosung, Kings, Chana and Nachusa. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 91 and 107. I-88 between mile markers 55 and 82. This includes... Castle Rock State Park, Lowden State Park, Ogle County Fairgrounds, and White Pines State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
